title: Retro AIAD Theme
content:
[[iftags +theme]]

[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--code/theme%3Ay2k/1');
[[/module]]

[[>]]
**Rating:**
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[>]]
**Rating w/ Credit Module:**
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
Info about your page.
[[include :scp-wiki:info:more]]
More information about your page.
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

This is a modified version of [[*user etoisle]]'s Y2K theme, developed by [[*user Placeholder McD]] for the Retro AIAD series being written for the 2020 Canon Renaissance Contest. It probably would not be appropriate to use it outside of this setting. 

The logo was made for this theme by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]. The background image was originally made by etoisle and edited by EstrellaYoshte.

To import this theme to your page, put the following text anywhere inside it:

[[div class="code"]]
@@[[include :scp-wiki:theme:y2k]]@@
@@[[include :scp-wiki:theme:retro-aiad-theme]]@@
[[/div]]

-----

+ Examples

[[include component:image-block name=retroaiadlogo2000.png|caption=Retro AIAD Logo|width=200px]]

A horizontal rule can be created with 5 hyphens "-----" and extends across the whole page if it's not placed inside anything (eg a blockquote). The lines separating sections of this document are horizontal rules.

Titles can be created by putting between one and six plus "+" at the start of the line

[[collapsible show="+ Titles" hide="- Titles"]]
+ First Title

++ Second Title

+++ Third Title

++++ Fourth Title

+++++ Fifth Title

++++++ Sixth Title
[[/collapsible]]

@@ @@

[[tabview]]
[[tab Tabulator]]
This is a tab view.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Tabulation]]
Hey look, more text here.

How quaint.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Long Tab]]

This is a long tab. It contains a lot of text.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Empty Tab]]
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

> This is a blockquote, created by putting "> " at the start of each line.
>
> More text
> -----
> That's a horizontal rule
>
>> Nested blockquotes

||~ This is a ||~ table ||
||You should know || how to make these ||
||||already ||

The font used is Microsoft Sans Serif.

-----
Source code
[[collapsible show="+ Show code" hide="- Hide code"]]
[[code type="css"]]

/*
    RETRO AIAD Theme
    [2020 Wikidot Theme]
    By Placeholder McD
    Based on Y2K Theme created by Etoisle 
*/

div#container-wrap {
    background-image: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:retro-aiad-theme/retroaiadbg.png');
}

div#header {
    background-image: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:retro-aiad-theme/retroaiadlogo.png');
}

#header h1 span {
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}

#header h1 span::before {
    font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif";
    content: "Infotech Department";
    color: #ffffff;
    text-shadow: 3px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}
 
#header h2 span::before {
    content: "Artificial Intelligence Applications Division";
}
[[/code]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/iftags]]


[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--code/theme:retro-aiad-theme/1');
[[/module]]
author: Placeholder McD
